The chronological order of the story is 1st chapter > 5th chapter > Epilogue > 3rd chapter > 2nd chapter > 4th chapter. The order of the first three is obvious but you can tell where the others lie. In the 3rd chapter, the 1st guy's oldest daughter with Aoi, Sakura, is 160 years old and in high school. In the 2nd chapter, Kagura, the 2nd guy's wife and Sakura's younger half-sister by a year or two is already an adult who has had a writing career for at least a couple of decades so it has to take place after the 3rd chapter. At the end of the 4th chapter it's confirmed that it's been hundreds of years since the maids joined the house of the first master which Carla's presence in the 5th story clearly marks the 1st guy as that master meaning it's the last story in the timeline.

I know I shouldn't overthinking it but knowing the dude dies and some of his girls are going to go on and bang others kind of bums me out. Anyway I'll try to clear it up...1st story: 1st guy gets an elf harem in the past...2nd story: 2nd guy is married to the 1st guy's daughter he had with the chief's daughter and then 2nd guy also also bangs the same chief's daughter and the chief herself...3rd story: 3rd guy bangs sensei and students. One of the students is 1st guy's oldest daughter with main girl from 1st story...4th story: 4th guy is 1st guy's descendant and one of the maids was part of 1st guy's harem in the 5th story. 5th story: Still in the past, 1st guy adds the chief and chief's daughter from 2nd story, the sensei from the 3rd story, and one of the maids from the 4th story to his harem...Epilogue: 1st chronological appearance of 1st guy's daughter that appears in 3rd story and chief's daughter is pregnant with 2nd guy's wife.
These guys live in heaven every single day
